name: MINIMA (Icoso)
description:
Hey! I'm Icoso, an indie game dev with a passion for programming, designing, music composition, and so much more! I'd love if you could check out some of these social media links below - thank you so much! :D

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL7FCx3MrwKGYFEs91Lz0yg

Twitter: https://twitter.com/icoso_games

Discord: https://discord.gg/uvMRDUW

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/icoso_games/

Programs Used

Game Engine: Unity3D

Graphics: Aseprite and Photoshop

Music: FL Studio

Sound Effects: Bfxr and Audacity

Mental Support: My cat

Thank you so much for playing the game! I hope you enjoy! :D
